entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
